stages.logText: Mikhail gave me a book in which I could put down my most unusual experiences and achievements.
On the road: My first glimpse of the great Duleian Road!
Prospector: I collected at least 100,000 gold.
Birdwatching: I spotted a falcon high above the Lake Laeroth watchtower.
Lazy day: I spent a while watching a beetle fight.
The secret garden: Near Guynmart Castle, I found Rob's secret clearing.
Hole in the wall: I discovered a secret room deep in a cave.
Tough luck: I must have fallen for every trap in the Arulir mountain. Ouch...
Swimming lessons: I swam along a raging river - and lived!
I braved the elements and my fear of heights and walked out onto the very edge of the Sullengard ravine and looked straight down to it's bottom.
Thrown out of my first tavern. I was told to leave the Sullengard tavern and at such a young age too. Am I starting down the wrong path?
